column3: Latest;Kampong Speu:------ At 2:30 pm on June 5
column5: anti-narcotics police arrested six suspects in Chambuk Commune
column8: Kampong Speu Province.------ Officers seized: ------– A large bag of drugs (meth) ------– Scales ------ 2 swords ------– 8 motorbikes ------– 1 car ------– 71 live chickens.------Following the arrest the seized items
column10: were taken for temporary storage at the Samrong Tong Police Inspectorate.------ Five suspects were questioned at the Anti-Narcotics Bureau of the Provincial Police Commissariat and the man believed to be the mastermind behind the drugs/chicken operation
